dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Illegal and Immoral]
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf Of
The Planet Policy Enforcement
Sent: Sunday, April 02, 2006 10:23 PM
To: kamil101@gmail.com; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Illegal and Immoral]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] Illegal and Immoral
Date:         Sat, 1 Apr 2006 13:14:33 -0500
From:         Kamil Hornadous <kamil101@gmail.com>
To:         abuse@theplanet.com



To Whom It May Concern:

Please stop offering a link to the crack for any of the slysoft products .
We make a living selling software and you are taking money away from us and
our families. We will do what ever we can to prosecute you and the writer of
the crack!

http://forumw2.org/viewtopic.php?t=5759
http://forumw2.org/viewtopic.php?t=5329
<http://forumw2.org/viewtopic.php?t=5329>
http://forumw2.org/viewtopic.php?t=2864
http://forumw2.org/viewtopic.php?t=1435
http://forumw2.org/viewtopic.php?t=1042
http://forumw2.org/viewtopic.php?t=582

SlySoft Europe Ltd., MALLOW, CORK, Ireland.

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
